airportConditionDefinitions.text: RUNWAY CONDITIONS CODE SIX. SIX. SIX. CONTAMINATION DRY. DRY. DRY.
RUNWAY CONDITIONS CODE FIVE. FIVE. FIVE. CONTAMINATION WET. WET. WET.
PILOTS MAY REQUEST RUNWAY 34L.
PILOTS MAY REQUEST RWY 16R.
ALL PILOTS SHALL REPORT TO FIUME GROUND IF ABLE TO DEPART FROM BC OR BD INTERSECTION AFTER PUSHBACK.
PILOTS HAVE REPORTED WINDSHEAR ON FINAL.
LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES IN PROGRESS
REDUCED RUNWAY SEPARATION MINIMA PROCEDURES IN PROGRESS.
STANDARD 1 MEANS MONITOR GROUND ON FREQUENCY 121.90, CONTINUE TAXI VIA TWY D AND HOLD SHORT OF TWY EG.
